resources.title: English
resources.string_upd: Exceeded max files to send in one message (maximum {0})!
resources.string_add: This file type is not allowed!

To make video conference more stable and reliable we have to use mobile application. It is possible to connect via our own mobile app (just download it from the App Store) or through the original Jitsi application. Continue with jitsi app?
